ordersText.title: INFOSLAVE SKULLS
ordersText.general: After drawing cards during the preparation step of a combat you start with this order, you may reroll 1 die for each of your units in the contested area. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: MASTER OF THE MACHINES
ordersText.general: While resolving this order, you may either increase your deploy limit by 1 or reduce the total materiel cost of purchased units and structures by 1. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: SACRED  OILS
ordersText.general: After drawing cards during the preparation step of a combat you start with this order, you may draw 2 combat cards and then discard 2 combat cards. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: BLESSED CONDUITS
ordersText.general: After you resolve this order, you may purchase 1 unit and place it on the world with the factory you moved. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND. *newline* REQUIRES MASTER OF THE MACHINES.

ordersText.title: FLESH IS WEAK
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. During this orbital strike, you may spend 2 [S]. If you do and there are no enemy units or bastions on this world after resolving this orbital strike, take control of all structures on this world. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: THE QUEST FOR KNOWLEDGE
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* At the end of the Planning Phase, you may discard this card to take 1 of your order tokens from the top of a stack and place it on the top of a stack in an adjacent system you are allowed to place order tokens in, either on the top of a stack or beginning a new one.

eventsText.title: BATTLE FORGES
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* When you reveal an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to purchase a factory and place it on a friendly world in the active system.

eventsText.title: NECROMECHANIC
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* When you skip your turn during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to draw 2 cards from the top of your event deck and resolve their abilities.

eventsText.title: RAD-BOMBARDMENT
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Before you perform an orbital strike, you may discard this card to reduce the health value of enemy units on the world by 1 during this orbital strike. Units with their health value reduced to 0 are destroyed immediately.

eventsText.title: LINGUA-TECHNIS
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 order upgrade, reducing its materiel cost by 1 for each friendly world containing a factory.

eventsText.title: THE CRIMSON GUARD
eventsText.general: Either spend 2 materiel to place 2 free Skitarii on a friendly world containing a factory or place 1 free Skitarii on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: BLESSING OF THE MACHINE GOD
eventsText.general: Gain 1 cache token and 1 forge token.

eventsText.title: MECHAMORPHOSIS
eventsText.general: Replace 1 Skitarii with 1 free Kataphron, replace 1 Kataphron with 1 free Onager, or spend 1 forge token to replace 1 Onager with 1 free Warlord Titan.

combatText.title: SHIELD FORMATION
combatText.unit: Slave soldier/Cruiser/Bastion: You must convert 1 of your [D] to [S].

combatText.title: BRUTAL ATTRITION
combatText.general: If this world contains a structure, gain 1 [D]. *newpara* Gain up to 2 (B). Your opponents gains that many (B).
combatText.unit: Slave soldier/Cruiser: Convert 1 of your [D] to [B].

combatText.title: PURGE THE WEAK
combatText.general: If this world contains a structure, gain 1 [S]. *newpara* Destroy any number of friendly routed units to gain 1 [M] and 1 materiel for each one.

combatText.title: WARSMITH
combatText.unit: Siege Marine: if this world contains no structures, rout 1 friendly level 0 unit to buy and immediately place a friendly factory on this world.

combatText.title: IRON WITHIN
combatText.general: If this world contains a structure, gain 1 [D]. *newpara* You must convert 1 [D] to [M].
combatText.unit: Siege Marine/Cruiser: After the next assess damage step if no friendly units have been destroyed, rally 1 unit.

combatText.title: DIG IN!
combatText.unit: Siege Marine: If this world contains no structures, spend 1 [M] and destroy a friendly level 0 unit to immediatly place a free friendly bastion on it.

combatText.title: OBLITERATORS
combatText.general: Loose 1 [S]. At the beginning of the next execution round gain 1 [B] and 3 (B).
combatText.unit: Siege Marine/Cruiser: Gain 1 (S). Destroy your unrouted Siege Marine to destroy a structure on this world.

combatText.title: IRON WITHOUT
combatText.general: If this world contains a structure, gain 1 [D]. *newpara* Gain 2 (B) or 2 (S) in any combination. Your opponent gains the same combination of (B) and (S).
combatText.unit: Slave soldier/Cruiser/Bastion: Convert 1 of your [D] to [S] or [B].

combatText.title: JUDGEMENT OF IRON
combatText.general: Spend up to 2 [S]. Gain 2 (B) for every die spent. *newpara* If this world contains a friendly structure, gain 1 [S].
combatText.unit: Leviathan/Grand Cruiser: Gain 1 [B]. If this world contains your opponent's structure, destroy it.

combatText.title: SIEGECRAFT
combatText.general: Gain 1 (B) or 1 (S). Convert 1 of your [D] to [M].
combatText.unit: Leviathan/Grand Cruiser: Spend 1 [M] to force your opponent to either discard 2 reinforcement tokens or loose 2 [M] in any combination (your opponent chooses).

combatText.title: THOROUGH PREPARATIONS
combatText.general: Convert 1 of your [D] to [S]. *newpara* Resolve one of the following: *newline* If this world contains a structure, gain materiel equal to the world's materiel value. *newpara* Take your set-aside dominate order token and place it on top of this system's order stack.

combatText.title: HAMMER OF OLYMPIA
combatText.general: Spend up to 4 [S] or [M]. For every die spent, gain 2 (B) and your opponent gains 2 (B). *newline* If this world contains a friendly structure your opponent looses 2 (B).

combatText.title: DEADLY EFFICIENCY
combatText.unit: Donjon/Grand Cruiser: Immediately reveal the topmost card of the tactic stack and play it.
